author: bnicholes
msg: Switched to using atomic operations for tracking the active threads rather
than having to lock and unlock a mutex.

author: wrowe
msg: A few more unused/unnecessary variables and surpress an uninitialized

author: ianh
msg: add 2 new enviornment variables to deal with misbehaving backends
"proxy-nokeepalive" which removes the Connection: line completely
"force-proxy-request-1.0" which forces the request to be HTTP/1.0
this allows apache to reverse proxy misbehaving appservers

author: wrowe
msg: Clean up new compiler emit noise
